|brand = Seagate |model = GoFlex |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Home |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = STAM1000100 |page_start_date = 02/03/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Seagate_GoFlex_Home |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6281; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv5 |cpu1_type_rev = (Kirkwood) |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 800 MHz / 1.0 / 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;29F2G08AAD; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = 800 |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU64M16DG-AC; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1116R; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:10:75
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;Cloud Engines; |stockos = Linux;2.6.22.18;Axentra HipServ OS;
|exp_if_types = SATA,USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_sata_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 10-pin header,, populated,, (115200,8N,1,),, J1 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, heatsink |addchip = 1.5/2A, 1MHz Dual Step-down Regulator;Marvell;88PG8227;;2;,,, Field Programmable DSP Switcher;Marvell;88PG847B;;1;,,, 16V/4A 500kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP8708EN;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = stxadmin |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 10/2010 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B003SU4BXQ |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "EHDUL4 7D28UL44001R1" and "REV.01" are silkscreened on the board.
===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Marvell]] Kirkwood @1.2GHz :Architecture: ARMv5te *RAM: 128MB (DDR2-800) *Flash: 256MB (NAND) *USB: 1x USB 2.0 *SATA: 1x SATA *LAN: 1x GbE (RJ45) <small> :The GoFlex Home [[Property:Is a|is a]] device based on the [[Marvell]] Sheeva plug computer platform, ::and is the successor to the [[Seagate Dockstar|DockStar]] and sister device to the GoFlex Net. :Unlike the GoFlex Net, the GoFlex Home comes with a single SATA connection ::used by either a 1, 2, or 3 TB hard drive that comes with the device. </small>
==Links of Interest== [http://archlinuxarm.org/platforms/armv5/seagate-goflex-home ''Run Linux on the GoFlex Home'']
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/seagate/seagate_goflexhome |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/seagate/goflexhome |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = kirkwood |subtarget = generic |arch = arm_xscale |support_started_version = 15.05 |current_supported_version = 23.05.3 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
